channel.title: RuneRemix - BETA testers needed
channel.description:
Hey,
I'm currently working on a 317 server. It has some bugs. It's not done at all.
If you have ideas or found bugs, post them on the forum!
Do not even bother to join when you dont like x4 XP rates and you wont get many items, small amount of shops, it's more survival.
So If you are interrested, I hope to see you on the server!
http://runeremix.com Flexz
Note: I'm from Belgium, I know my english is not so good.. Edit: I will add some pics soon if you want them

item.title: RuneRemix - BETA testers needed
item.dc:creator: @Flexz Flexz
item.description:

Hey,
